aboutMe.name: Ioan Dimitrov
aboutMe.description: I am a passionate and detail-oriented front-end developer focused on creating visually appealing, functional, and user-friendly web applications. With experience in designing responsive interfaces and implementing dynamic features using modern technologies, I love working in a team and creating exceptional solutions that combine design and technology.

workExperienceList.description: Led the development of responsive web applications tailored to client needs, using React and Angular. Collaborated with designers and backend developers to ensure seamless user experience. Optimized website performance, reducing loading time by 30%, and implemented best practices for accessibility and SEO.

Supported the team in developing and maintaining over 15 client websites. Worked with WordPress and JavaScript libraries to enhance functionality. Assisted senior developers in solving technical problems and proposing innovative design improvements.

Designed and developed customized websites for small businesses and startups, focusing on usability, aesthetics, and branding. Provided comprehensive service from client consultation to final implementation. Delivered quality projects on time and within budget, building long-term client relationships.

educationList.description: Completed a comprehensive program focused on computer science fundamentals, software development, and web technologies. Gained practical experience with programming languages, databases, and modern web frameworks.

Gained in-depth knowledge of full-stack application development, including front-end technologies like React and back-end technologies like Node.js. Participated in real-world projects to build practical experience.
Graduated with foundations in mathematics, sciences, and basic programming. Participated in technology fairs and developed early projects that sparked my interest in web development.
Focused on understanding user behavior and creating designs that improve usability and accessibility. Refined skills in creating wireframes, prototypes, and conducting usability tests.

coursesList.name: Certified Front-End Developer
coursesList.description: Certified knowledge and skills in front-end technologies, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern frameworks like React and Angular.

coursesList.name: JavaScript Specialist
coursesList.description: Proven skills in JavaScript, including ES6+, asynchronous programming, and DOM manipulation.

coursesList.name: Responsive Web Design
coursesList.description: Learned principles of adaptive design with CSS and created mobile-oriented websites.

coursesList.name: Version Control with Git
coursesList.description: Acquired skills in version management, including cloning, merging, and conflict resolution.

coursesList.name: Introduction to UI/UX Design
coursesList.description: Learned principles of UI/UX design, user research, and prototyping.

projectsList.name: Portfolio Website
projectsList.description: Visually appealing and functional portfolio showcasing my skills, experience, and projects. Developed with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, with a responsive design for all devices.

projectsList.name: E-Commerce Platform
projectsList.description: Robust and scalable e-commerce platform with a modern user interface and payment integration.

projectsList.name: Chat Application
projectsList.description: Real-time chat application with capabilities for personal and group messaging. Built with Vue.js and Socket.IO.

technicalSkills.description: High level of expertise in creating modular and dynamic applications with React. Experience in state management through Redux.
Expertise in creating semantic and accessible interfaces with CSS Grid and Flexbox.
Experience working with Git/GitHub for collaboration and project management.

softSkills.description: Analysis of complex tasks and implementation of technical solutions in short timeframes.
Excellent skills for interacting with teams, clients, and stakeholders.
Quick adaptation to new technologies and work environments.
